fulltext:
THONG MINH NGUYEN 
Address: 251/35 Le Quang Dinh Street, Ward 7, Binh Thanh 
District ,VietNam 
Mobile:  
Email:  
Date of birth: 07 Jun 1985 
ABOUT ME 
I love coding,develop web/mobile.It’s my interesting. I can build whole system and manage one team from 
A->Z. I can design database, work with designer for designing UI/UX mobile application. Then I can build 
or support technology for backend (API) with PHP/NodeJS and I can build Android Mobile Application 
myself. I have built Social Application which intergrated Facebook, Google+ with difficult technology such 
as Chat (XMPP Ejabberd server). I'm Fullstack Developer 
EDUCATION 
Bachelor of Physic IT 
Physic Information Technology, University of Natural Sciences,HCM city 
September 2003 – July 2007 
CURRENT COMPANY 
Fullstack at Home as Freelancer / Remote Developer 
Mar 2016-Now  
TOP SKILLS 
Languages & script:  Java, NodeJS, ReactJS 
Frameworks: Express, Moleculer Micro Service  
Database: MS SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, MongoDb, Postgress 
Web Server: Tomcat 7 Server + Apache Server,Glassfish Server ,OAS (Oracle Application Server),  
CI Tool: Docker / GCP  
WORK EXPERIENCES 
Software Development Experience 
* Freelance at Home (Mar 2016 – Now) 
1.Project: MasCall 
Project Description: It's one tool to manage Telesale team. Record time and number of calls of one Telesale 
Project Team Size: 1 
Role(s): I'm backend and frontend developer to develop it. https://mascall.herokuapp.com/ 
Technology: NodeJS (Express Framework), ReactJS  
2.Project : SpaVN 
Project Description: Social Network to communicate users who love spa and want to find spa in website , 
mobile. Users could comment and review 
Project Team Size: 6 
Role(s): Backend developer , I code API with Nodejs (Microservice https://moleculer.services/)  for system 
and manage team as project manager. I also code front end website with https://material-ui.com/ 
Technology: NodeJS , ReactJS  
3.Project : LaundrySG 
Project Description: This is one startup laundry in Saigon 
Project Team Size: 4 
Role(s): Backend developer , I code API with https://strapi.io/ . It’s like Parse in the past. With Strapi I 
implement GraphQL into backend. 
Technology: NodeJS , ReactJS  
4.Project : eThinkCard 
Project Description: Social Network to communicate with electric name card on mobile. Users could send 
name card each other. 
Project Team Size: 3 
Role(s): Backend developer , I code API with Nodejs with Express Framework https://expressjs.com/ 
5.Project : Check In System 
Project Description: The system includes one website to manage user check in one event. User can use 
mobile scan QR code ticket from customer. 
Project Team Size: 2 
Role(s): PHP developer for backend 
6.Project : Wherzat 
Project Description: Social Network to communicate users who could create event and invite friends. All 
data was encrypted. 
Project Team Size: 4 
Role(s): Android Developer & Project Manager. I code structure and basic Wherzat Android at first stage, 
then I move from android developer to project manager 
Technology: Java, XMPP  
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.wherzat.app&hl=en 
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/wherzat-stealth-social/id1354890211?mt=8 
7.Project : TopMot 
Project Description: Ecommerce Mobile App 
Project Team Size: 2 
Role(s): Mobile Leader
